Custom Splattershot Jr.

Custom Splattershot Jr.

Custom Splattershot Jr. stat page.
Information
Type Main
Required Level 2
Cost 800
Range
30 / 100
Damage
30 / 100
Fire Rate
70 / 100
Sub Weapon Disruptor
Special Weapon Echolocator

The Custom Splattershot Jr. is a Main Shooter weapon in Splatoon. 

Contents

[show]

    Description

    It is a "modified" version of the Splattershot Jr. that is in a set with the Disruptor and Echolocator. It is ideal for covering large territories with ink quickly--it's low accuracy provides a wider spread of ink while moving, and its low damage means it uses less ink per shot, allowing for more shots per tank. The Disruptor and Echolocator add to being ideal for support-based tactics of slowing down the enemy and locating all members of the opposing team for everyone to see. It shares the same stats as the Splattershot Jr., however it uses Disruptors and the Echolocator instead.

    Weapon Quote

    "A new build of the Splattershot Jr.. Sheldon built it after being inspired by some odd fluid he found stuck to the blueprints. Throw Disruptors at your opponents to slow them down."

    Names in other languages

    Language Name Notes
    Japanese もみじシューター Maple Shooter
